text: Ra Anumzana Israeli vahe Anumzamo'a amanage huno hie, Babiloni kini ne'ene sondia vahe'amozanema kuma keginamofo fegi'ama eme kafoma ante'za mani kagi'nesaza vahe'enema ha'ma hunaku'ma tamazampima eritama vanaza ha' zantamina erineta ete rukrahe huta rankumapi efregahaze. Anama hanage'na Nagra ana ha' vahera zamatresanuge'za rankumapina efregahaze.
